SpeechSynthesisErrorEvent.summary: The SpeechSynthesisErrorEvent interface of the Web Speech API contains information about any errors that occur while processing objects in the speech service.

SpeechSynthesisErrorEventError.summary:
The error property of the
interface returns an error code indicating what has gone wrong with a speech synthesis attempt.
SpeechSynthesisErrorEventError.value: A string containing the error reason. Possible values are:

SpeechSynthesisErrorEventSpeechSynthesis.summary: The SpeechSynthesisErrorEvent() constructor creates a new object.

blockquote.para: A web developer doesn't typically need to call this constructor, as the browser creates these objects itself when firing events.
